title: Template URI
description: A URI with embedded expressions. Allowed expressions are ${level}, ${x} and ${y}. ${level} is substituted with the level of the node, ${x} is substituted with the x index of the node within the level, and ${y} is substituted with the y index of the node within the level. For tiling scheme `OCTREE`, ${z} may also be given, and it is substituted with the z index of the node within the level.
